pages.text: Thank you for using Umapyoi Mod. This module is based on the theme of Uma Musume Pretty Derby, with "Breeding & Inheritance" as the core gameplay.$(p)Being "Umamusume", Embark on a great adventure in Minecraft!

This module was developed by the "Tracen Academy Minecraft Group".$(p)Number: $(li)Leader / Dev: Syameimaru Zheng;$(li)Art: Kuguan_Boom, Dumnheint, TwinTurbo3116, omo, GoldYgg, Pajinyi, Syameimaru Zheng; $(li)Promotion: Syameimaru Zheng, Limuness $(li)Special thanks : Yuriscat
